pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.3: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.4: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.5: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.16: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’ti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.18: ‘māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.19: chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.20: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya, bhayāpi gaccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.21: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.22: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.23: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.6: adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.16: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.17: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.19: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.26: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.28: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.36: ‘Suṇātu me, ayye, saṃgho. Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.37: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.39: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.42: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.45: $Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.47: $“chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.49: $Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.50: $Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.53: $Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.56: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.57: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.61: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.62: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.71: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
